name: fc_users

File: application/models/User.php
Class: Model_User
Functions: createUser(), getUserInfo(), update()

technicalDetails:
File: application/models/User.php
Class: Model_User
Ref: const TABLE_USER_SOCIAL

name: fc_jewel_scores

frontendUsage: Shown in the 'High Scores' list after finishing a game. POST to /games/save-score immediately after game over.
technicalDetails:
File: application/models/Jewelscores.php
Class: Model_Gamescores
Controller: GamesController::saveScoreAction

name: fc_jewel_score_totals
description: Stores sum_scores and num_scores per flashcard set to calculate averages.
frontendUsage: Used to show 'Average Score' on the game intro screen. Updated automatically whenever a new score is inserted.

File: application/models/Jewelscores.php
Class: Model_Gamescores
Functions: create() (updates totals)
